reporter-output.line: Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Modules dialog'.
Enter 'MPS' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Verify the 'MPS' check box is checked.
Mouse over the 'MPS Blocks' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Add a new MPS block dialog'.
Enter '0b99b00fb2f0477' in the 'Block Name' text box.
Verify success message of '0b99b00fb2f0477 has been created.' is present.
Mouse over the 'Web services' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'MPS Configuration dialog'.
Enter 'mps.io' in the 'MPS Host' text box.
Enter 'pub7-development' in the 'Site Instance Override' text box.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Verify warning message 'These blocks don't exist in the list of ad blocks retrieved: ' is present.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Blocks dialog'.
Select the block name 'bottommulti (MPS)' from the '- None -' drop down list.
Select the block name 'topbanner (MPS)' from the '- None -' drop down list.
Select the block name 'topbox (MPS)' from the '- None -' drop down list.
Select the block name 'topmulti (MPS)' from the '- None -' drop down list.
Select the block name '0b99b00fb2f0477 (MPS)' from the '- None -' drop down list.
Select the block name '0b99b00fb2f0477 (MPS)' from the 'Header' drop down list.
Verify success message of 'The block settings have been updated.' is present.
Mouse over the 'Web services' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'MPS Configuration dialog'.
Enter 'mps.io' in the 'MPS Host' text box.
Enter 'sandbox' in the 'Site Instance Override' text box.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
